[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@elux/vue-web](./vue-web.md) &gt; [EluxLocation](./vue-web.eluxlocation.md) &gt; [pathmatch](./vue-web.eluxlocation.pathmatch.md)

## EluxLocation.pathmatch property

EluxUrl 中的 path 部分称为 `pathmatch`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pathmatch: string;
```

## Remarks

通常它由 [NativeLocation.pathname](./vue-web.nativelocation.pathname.md) 通过 [NativeLocationMap.in()](./vue-web.nativelocationmap.in.md) 转换而来，并将最终通过[PagenameMap](./vue-web.pagenamemap.md) 提取 `PathParams` 后转换为 [StateLocation.pagename](./vue-web.statelocation.pagename.md)
